reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Indonesia Prosperity Fund Programme - Renewable Energy

description.narrative: Support to the Renewable Energy strand of the Indonesia Prosperity Fund Programme. This programme will deliver poverty reduction, economic development and gender equality by developing the renewable energy sector to best support poor communities, with a focus on eastern Indonesia which has the poorest provinces of Indonesia. As a secondary benefit, it will create opportunities for international business, including the UK, in the renewable energy sector.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
